entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
